name: openmanager-ai-gateway
description: AI Gateway Function - 베르셀 요청을 GCP Functions로 라우팅

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy ai-gateway --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 256MB --timeout 60s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.deploy:health: gcloud functions deploy ai-gateway-health --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 128MB --timeout 10s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.logs: gcloud functions logs read ai-gateway --region asia-northeast3
